# London Trip Planner - Copilot Instructions

This is an interactive web application for planning a multi-day trip to London (December 24-29, 2025).

## Project Overview
- **Type**: Interactive Web Application
- **Purpose**: Optimize parking and route planning for a 6-day London trip
- **Tech Stack**: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Leaflet.js, OpenStreetMap

## Key Features
- Interactive map with location markers
- Parking optimization algorithm (priority 1)
- Day-by-day itinerary planning
- Infant-friendly location indicators
- Weather considerations
- Christmas opening hours tracking
- Distance and time calculations

## Development Guidelines
- Keep code modular and well-commented
- Prioritize parking minimization in optimization algorithms
- Ensure responsive design for mobile and desktop
- Use Leaflet.js for mapping functionality
- Store location data in structured JSON format
